theorem_statement: Let $n$ be a positive integer and let $A$ be a set of positive integers. Let $s\in A$. We have \begin{equation} N_A^q(n)-N_A^q(n-s)+N_A^q(n-2s)+\cdots =N_{{A\setminus\{s\}}}^q(n)+q_{{A\setminus\{s\}}}(n-s)-q_{{A\setminus\{s\}}}(n-2s)+\cdots \end{equation}

sections.title: Generating Functions for $N_A^p(n)$ and $N_A^q(n)$, and Six ways to Convolution and Recurrence Identities
Asymptotic Estimate of $N_A^p(n)$ when $A$ is a Finite Set
